data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Suzuka-saaan!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Suzuka-saaan!!

data.text: …fufuu!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…fufuu!

data.text: Suzuka-san!! You were suuuuuuuper cool out there!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Suzuka-san!! You were suuuuuuuper cool out there!!

data.text: Thanks, Spe-chan.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Thanks, Spe-chan.

data.text:
Really, you've shown us such an absurd running-style. 
You're even making us want to take off running like that.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Really, you've shown us such an absurd running-style. 
<story>You're even making us want to take off running like that.

data.text: You said it…
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>You said it…

data.text: But, we won't let you pull ahead by youself just like this.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>But, we won't let you pull ahead by youself just like this.

data.text:
I'm also overflowing with excitement and emotion!! 
Absolutely, I want to run together with Suzuka-san again!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
<story>I'm also overflowing with excitement and emotion!! 
<story>Absolutely, I want to run together with Suzuka-san again!

data.text: Well well, you have definitely shown me something very exciting.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed: <story>Well well, you have definitely shown me something very exciting.

data.text: Tachyon…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Tachyon…?

data.text:
Today's run will, without a doubt, push "Uma Musume" 
to the next stage. I have a hunch that it'll become 
an important historical event.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Today's run will, without a doubt, push "Uma Musume" 
<story>to the next stage. I have a hunch that it'll become 
<story>an important historical event.

data.text:
Suzuka-kun and Trainer, you two are truly 
the ideal research materials.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-kun and Trainer, you two are truly 
<story>the ideal research materials.

data.text: Research materials… eh? Research…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Research materials… eh? Research…?

data.text:
From now on, we'll show you even more of the 
"Uma Musume" Silence Suzuka continuing to chase her "scenery".
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>From now on, we'll show you even more of the 
<story>"Uma Musume" Silence Suzuka continuing to chase her "scenery".

data.text: Fufuu… how reliable of you two.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed: <story>Fufuu… how reliable of you two.

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…?

data.text:
Alright, you've got an award ceremony to attend, 
so we can't stand here all day.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, you've got an award ceremony to attend, 
<story>so we can't stand here all day.

data.text:
Alright, you've got an award ceremony to attend, 
so we can't stand here all day.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, you've got an award ceremony to attend, 
<story>so we can't stand here all day.

data.text: Yeah, you're right.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yeah, you're right.

data.text:
…Everyone, thank you for your support. 
While I was running, I could hear all of your voices.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…Everyone, thank you for your support. 
<story>While I was running, I could hear all of your voices.

data.text: And, Trainer-san's voice too.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>And, Trainer-san's voice too.

data.text:
Gently giving you that push forward, is my duty after all. 
And you've done more than responded to that-
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Gently giving you that push forward, is my duty after all. 
<story>And you've done more than responded to that-

data.text:
Gently giving you that push forward, is my duty after all. 
And you've done more than responded to that-
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Gently giving you that push forward, is my duty after all. 
<story>And you've done more than responded to that-

data.text: Fufuu… Yes, I've returned.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu… Yes, I've returned.

data.text: Well then everyone, we'll have to continue this talk later.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Well then everyone, we'll have to continue this talk later.

data.text:
Hmmm… being called research materials, 
she does not seem to like that.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm… being called research materials, 
<story>she does not seem to like that.

data.text:
Well, it is not as if it really matters what I call 
her. But if it seems to bother her, then…
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Well, it is not as if it really matters what I call 
<story>her. But if it seems to bother her, then…

data.text:
Suzuka-kun is, the "dream" of many Uma Musume and people- 
How does that sound?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-kun is, the "dream" of many Uma Musume and people- 
<story>How does that sound?

data.text: Yeah, that sounds the most appropriate.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, that sounds the most appropriate.

data.text: Yeah, that sounds the most appropriate.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, that sounds the most appropriate.

data.text: Suzukaaa! Thanks for the awesome race!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed: <story>Suzukaaa! Thanks for the awesome race!

data.text: From now on, show us more of that running!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed: <story>From now on, show us more of that running!

data.text:
Thank you very much. 
Everyone's cheers, gave me the gentle push I needed.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Thank you very much. 
<story>Everyone's cheers, gave me the gentle push I needed.

data.text:
From now on, for the sake of continuing to see a lot more 
"scenery" I will continue running… and-
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>From now on, for the sake of continuing to see a lot more 
<story>"scenery" I will continue running… and-

data.text: I'll continue to show everyone the "scenery" that I see…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>I'll continue to show everyone the "scenery" that I see…!
